lib/hope/components/switch_expression/switch_expression.h

00008 
00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include <any>
00012 #include <cassert>
00013 #include <unordered_map>
00014 #include <functional>
00015 
00016 namespace hope {
00017 
00018     template<typename Key>
00019     class switch_expression final {
00020         using functor_t = std::function<void()>;
00021         using switch_t = std::unordered_map<Key, functor_t>;
00022         using this_t = switch_expression<Key>;
00023 
00024         class key_value_pair final {
00025         public:
00026             key_value_pair(this_t& master, const Key& key)
00027                 : m_key(key)
00028                 , m_master(master) {}
00029 
00030             template<typename Functor>
00031             this_t& operator()(Functor&& function) {
00032                 m_master.m_switch[m_key] = std::forward<Functor>(function);
00033                 return m_master;
00034             }
00035 
00036         private:
00037             const Key& m_key;
00038             this_t& m_master;
00039         };
00040 
00041         friend class key_value_pair;
00042     public:
00043         switch_expression(const Key& key)
00044             : m_key(key) { }
00045 
00046         ~switch_expression() {
00047             if (auto && it = m_switch.find(m_key); it != std::end(m_switch))
00048                 it->second();
00049         }
00050 
00051         key_value_pair operator[](const Key& key) {
00052             const auto it = m_switch.find(key);
00053             assert(it == std::cend(m_switch));
00054             (void)it; // remove clang unused variable warning
00055             auto&& [elementIt, _] = m_switch.emplace(key, functor_t{});
00056             return { *this, elementIt->first };
00057         }
00058      
00059     private:
00060         Key m_key;
00061         switch_t m_switch;
00062     };
00063 
00064     template<typename Key>
00065     switch_expression(Key)->switch_expression<std::decay_t<Key>>;
00066 }
